name: slither-slider
description: Simple Vue JS slider for Vue JS that pretty much takes what you throw at it. Features 'fullscreen', lazy loading, and easy customization

scripts.build-all: npm run build-lib:library && npm run build-lib:plugin && vue-cli-service build
scripts.build-lib: npm run build-lib:library && npm run build-lib:plugin
scripts.build-lib:library: vue-cli-service build --environment production --target lib --name slither-slider src/library-entry.js --dest library-dist/
scripts.build-lib:plugin: vue-cli-service build --environment production --target lib --name slither-slider src/library-plugin.js --dest plugin-dist/
scripts.publish-docs: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
